responsibilities: We are seeking a Data Engineer with mandatory MuleSoft integration experience to support BAU operations and develop new integration solutions. This role requires a unique combination of data engineering expertise and hands-on MuleSoft development
requirements: 4+ years of experience in data engineering or integration development
Mandatory: Hands-on MuleSoft Anypoint Platform experience (minimum 2 years)
MuleSoft certifications (Developer Level 1 or higher highly regarded)
Strong experience with MuleSoft API design, development, and deployment
Proficiency in DataWeave for data transformation
Experience with RESTful and SOAP web services
